content.en: Teleoperation optimization: Researchers have been exploring ways to improve the performance of teleoperation systems, where robots are controlled remotely by humans. They have developed algorithms that can compensate for uncertainties and time delays, ensuring stable and accurate control. These algorithms use techniques such as sliding-mode control, force estimation, and adaptive laws to achieve robustness and transparency in teleoperation systems.
content.da: Teleoperationsoptimering: Forskere har undersøgt måder at forbedre ydeevnen af teleoperationssystemer, hvor robotter styres eksternt af mennesker. De har udviklet algoritmer, der kan kompensere for usikkerheder og tidsforsinkelser, hvilket sikrer stabil og præcis kontrol. Disse algoritmer anvender teknikker som sliding-mode styring, kraftestimering og adaptive love for at opnå robusthed og gennemsigtighed i teleoperationssystemer.
